questions_configuration_query.insertReport: Insert into reports (DCPStudyId, URL, CreatedBy, UpdatedBy) VALUES (?,?,?,?)
questions_configuration_query.updateReport: Update reports SET DCPStudyId=?, URL=?, CreatedBy=?, UpdatedBy=? WHERE DCPStudyId =
questions_configuration_query.updateStudyToDownloaded: UPDATE studies SET Status = 'Downloaded' WHERE Id=?;
questions_configuration_query.updateStudyToCompleted: UPDATE studies SET Status = 'Completed' WHERE Id=?;
questions_configuration_query.findReportCron: SELECT * from report_cron where isReportSaved=? AND tryReportAgain=? LIMIT 10;
questions_configuration_query.updateReportCron: UPDATE report_cron SET isReportSaved = true WHERE studyId=?;
questions_configuration_query.updateReportCronAndEmail: UPDATE report_cron SET isReportSaved = true, isEmailSent = true, reportFailureReason = ''  WHERE studyId=?;
questions_configuration_query.getGraderFooter: SELECT * from reporttemplates where ReportTemplateTypeID = 4 AND SiteID =? AND GraderId =?;
